summary: This is an internal email from a contractor to an unspecified recipient regarding the handling of photos and videos from a device (NYC024362) related to the US v. Epstein investigation. The contractor has uploaded responsive and confidential materials to a shared drive and requests they be included in production and organized in a specific folder structure.

persons.name: Contractor
persons.context: The sender of the email who has uploaded photos and videos from a device related to the Epstein investigation to a shared drive and is requesting specific handling of the files.

keyFacts: A device identified as NYC024362 contained photos and videos deemed responsive and confidential in the US v. Epstein investigation.

These materials were uploaded to a Department of Justice shared drive (W_Jsa.doj.gov) in a folder specifically for confidential images and videos from Epstein devices in New York and the Virgin Islands.
The correspondence indicates an ongoing process of evidence management and production related to the Epstein case as of October 2020.
